Based on our past conversations, here's a
brief summary of the projects you've done
during your internship at CloudDefense.Al:

1. Al Buddies System:

You co-developed a cross-platform system
monitoring prototype that captures user
activity (e.g., active window title, screen
OCR, clipboard content) and uses a language
model to classify tasks like coding, reading,
or writing. This involved building two apps —
one for data capture and one for intelligent
interpretation.

2. Transactional Al (Beckn MCP Server):
You're implementing the MCP Server that
enables generative-agent-driven
transactions over the Beckn protocol. This
includes MongoDB-backed context
management and autonomous orchestration
logic, forming a key backend component in
the emerging decentralized commerce
framework.
